title: G-R-E-A-T!!!!!!!
text: We stayed there for 2 nights and had a great time. The room had hand-painted pictures of dolphins on the wall which was really neat. Besides, the room and bathroom was very clean and comfortable, JUST PERFECT!!!!!!! We just loved it!!!! The staff was very friendly and helpful. We had many questions about public transportations and got them all answered very friendly and patient.
